ideas.headerImageDescription: Outlandish creations from pixelated unicorns to drumbeat waveforms to levitating tacos to buckets of rainbows.
ideas.gettingStartedText: kai sabon shiga ne a Scratch? gwada fara koyo
ideas.gettingStartedImageDescription: An illustrated boy plants his flag on top of a freshly painted mountaintop.
ideas.activityGuidesText: me kakeso ka kirkira da Scratch? Ga kowane aiki, za ka iya gwada koyo, saukar satin katunan kodin, ko duba jagorar mai koyarwa.
ideas.animateANameDescription: yi zane mai motsin harufan sunanka, harifin farko no sunanka, ko kalma mafi soyuwa a gare ka
ideas.animateANameImageDescription: The name ANYA in all caps and blocked letters is poised to wiggle
ideas.animateACharacterDescription: kayarta da harafin da zane mai motsi
ideas.animateACharacterImageDescription: An taco with a wand, wizard cap and flowing white beard floats enchantingly in low-Earth orbit.
ideas.makeMusicDescription: Zaɓi kayan aiki, ƙara sautuna, kuma danna maɓalli don kunna kiɗa.
ideas.makeMusicImageDescription: Strings vibrate on an illustrated Gibson explorer.
ideas.createAStoryDescription: zaki harafi, kara tattaunawa, kuma kayatar da tasuniyar ka.
ideas.createAStoryImageDescription: A wizard beckons a traveling witch towards a distant castle.
ideas.chaseGameDescription: kirkiri wani wasa a inda zaka iya bin wani harafi da guda don samun maki.
ideas.chaseGameImageDescription: A happy interactive octopus passes over a star.
ideas.videoSensingDescription: yi hulda da wani aiki ta amfani karin na'ura mai gano bidiyo.
ideas.videoSensingImageDescription: A virtual hand dodges a spurt of flame in an attempt to pet a dragon.
ideas.cardsTitle: sami dukkanin tarin katunan yin kod
ideas.cardsText: Da katunan yin kod na Scratch, za ka iya koyon yadda zaka ƙirƙirar wasa mai mu'amala, tasuniyoyi, kidi, zane masu motsi, da abun da yafi hakan!
ideas.cardsIllustrationDescription: An assortment of fun, animated characters and objects leap out of a stack of cards.
ideas.starterProjectsText: Za ka iya wasa da ayyukan mai farawa da kuma sake gauraya su don yin kirkirar ka.
ideas.starterProjectsImageDescription: An illustration of the Scratch Code Editor.
ideas.starterProjectsButton: yi shawagi cikin ayyukan mai farawa
ideas.desktopEditorBody: Don ƙirƙira ayyuka ba tara da wani hadin yanar gizo ba, zaka iya sauke Scratch App.
ideas.desktopEditorBodyHTML: Don ƙirƙira ayyuka ba tara da wani hadin yanar gizo ba, zaka iya sauke Scratch App.
ideas.questionsBody: shin ana da wani tambaya? duba tamboyoyi da ake yawan yi ko ziyarci taimako tare da dandalin rubutu.
ideas.questionsBodyHTML: shin ana da wani tambaya? duba <faq>tamboyoyi da ake yawan yi</faq> ko ziyarci <forum>taimako tare da dandalin rubutu</forum>.
ideas.cardsPurchase: sayi set din da aka buga
ideas.MakeItFlyDescription: zabi kowane harafi kuma kasa ya tashi sama!
ideas.MakeItFlyImageDescription: The scratch cat flies over the skyline. Alongside a flying taco.
ideas.RaceDescription: kirkiri wasa da harafi biyu na tsare da junansu
ideas.HideAndSeekDescription: kirkiri wasan boyewa da kuma nema da harufa da ke bijirowa da bacewa.
ideas.FashionDescription: kirkiri wasan da zaka sa ma harrafi kaya da kaya daban daban da kala daban daban.
ideas.PongDescription: kirkiri wasa inda kwalo ke bonsin tare da sauti, maki,da sauran yaniyi.
ideas.PongImageDescription: A ball bounces off a digital paddle.
ideas.ImagineDescription: ya nazarin duniyar da komai ke yiwuwa.
ideas.ImagineImageDescription: A girl stands proudly in front of a thought bubble as big as the Earth and as intricate as butterfly wings.
ideas.DanceDescription: Zana wurin rawa mai rai tare da kiɗa da motsin rawa.
ideas.CatchDescription: kirkiri wasan da kake kama abubuwa da ke fadowa daga sama.
ideas.VirtualPetTitle: Dabbobin wasa da ke yanar gizo
ideas.VirtualPetDescription: ƙirƙiri wani dabba mai mu'amala da ke iya ci, sha, da wasa.
